definition: to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Locals also lit Kongming lanterns, and sent them into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 當地人還點亮孔明燈，把它們放飛到天空中。

sentences.english: She saw the light burning and ran the rest of the way to her house.
sentences.chinese: 她看到點亮的燈光，跑完了剩下的路到了家。

sentences.english: The star indeed was not lit that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上那盞星星燈確實沒有點亮。

sentences.english: The last byte illuminates and latches all odd-numbered LEDs.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個字節點亮並鎖存所有奇數LED。

sentences.english: "Light your lanthorn, old man, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “老頭兒，把你的燈籠點亮，”他說。

sentences.english: Kids reasly perk up children; they never turn off any lights.
sentences.chinese: 孩子準確點亮了一個家，他們從未燃燒過一盞燈。

sentences.english: To brighten your heart when the gray shadows fall.
sentences.chinese: 在灰霾降臨時點亮你的心靈。

sentences.english: She really didn't want to light her menorah either.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊也不願意去點亮她的燭臺。

sentences.english: He set straight the fluffy shade on the unlighted lamp.
sentences.chinese: 他全神貫注地整理那盞沒有點亮的燈上的絨毛燈罩。

sentences.english: Lit graphics, written in large bold font the name of your shop and service.
sentences.chinese: 點亮了圖形，寫在大字體加粗你的店鋪的名稱和服務。

sentences.english: I have stars in the sky but oh for my little lamp unlit in my house.
sentences.chinese: 我擁有滿天星辰，但我爲我家居未點亮的小燈而輕嘆。

sentences.english: Lighting the gas, he sat down, preparing to wait a little while.
sentences.chinese: 他點亮煤氣燈，坐了下來，準備等一小會兒。

sentences.english: Please find someone who can take on the task of keeping the star lit after my death.
sentences.chinese: 請在我死後找一個人來承擔點亮那盞星星燈的任務。

sentences.english: Many places have dazzling displays that light up the night.
sentences.chinese: 很多地方都有能夠點亮這個夜晚的絢麗多彩的表演。

sentences.english: The glowworms light the stars all over the sky in the night without moon.
sentences.chinese: 沒有月色的夜裏，螢火蟲用心點亮漫天的星。

sentences.english: Why does the lantern turn when we light up the electric bulb?
sentences.chinese: 當我們點亮燈泡時，爲什麼走馬燈會轉動？
